summary: This modification makes the Bar keeper outfit a lot more clean.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff]Just a side note:
1:This is my very first contribution to the Nexus Community.So go easy easy on me :)
2:English is not my first language.Bear with me.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
It always bothers me that the BarKeep outfit from Skyrim was too dirty.Because of this,I decided to make this retexture to make it look clean(er).It was intended for personal use at first but I decided to post it for the ones who needed it.

Since this is simply a retexture it should not be affecting any mods that changes the meshes of this outfit.In short,It SHOULD be compatible with Vanilla and other body mods (CBBE,UNP,etc)

I might make a male version.I don't know.Stuff like this takes two and a half hours to make.

[b][color=#00ff00][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/color][/b]

Installation should be easy but I'm leaving some details for the newbies.

You could either :-
[color=#ffff00]1:Drag or extract the 'textures' folder in the downloaded rar to the Data folder located in Steam/steamapps/commons/skyrim/Data.[/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=3][b]2:Download with manager.[/b][/size][/color]

([color=#ff0000]IMPORTANT NOTE[/color]:I have only tested installing this mod with the Mod Organizer.Please report for any problems and errors whilst installing this with the Nexus Mod Manager.)


Modify this for your own use if you wish but permission and credit is needed if any of the contents of this mod are to be used and published.
[color=#ffff00]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
author: Multalan111
